Hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Los Angeles, The Concourse Hotel at LAX - A Hyatt Affiliated Hotel is in the business district and convenient to Automobile Driving Museum and Toyota Sports Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Loyola Marymount University and Promenade at Howard Hughes Parkway Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 580 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary weekday newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features wedding services and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Los Angeles? This hotel has 42000 square feet (3902 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lakes at El Segundo - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Westfield Culver City Shopping Center - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi

Hollywood Park Casino - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Los Angeles Forum - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Fisherman's Village - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi

Manhattan Beach Pier - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Venice Fishing Pier - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Sony Pictures Studios - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi

The preferred airport for The Concourse Hotel at LAX - A Hyatt Affiliated Hotel is Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Radisson Hotel Los Angeles Airport is Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi.

RoomType.text: Double Standard Room with View + Free Wifi
Double Club Room + Free Wifi + airport transfer
Double Studio Suite + Free Wifi + airport transfer
Double Standard Room with View + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

A credit card security deposit is required upon check-in for charges or damages during the stay and will be refunded upon departure.,Pets are strictly prohibited at the property, with the exception of guide dogs.,The property provides a complimentary round-trip shuttle service to and from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX). The airport shuttle runs 24 hours daily, with pick-up and drop-off services scheduled at every 10 to 15 minute intervals. The shuttle stops are located outside of the baggage claim. Guests are requested to wait at the “Red” overhead sign that indicates “Hotel and Courtesy Shuttle”. The shuttles are noticeable by their purple and white colors, with the signage of Hyatt Regency and QuikPark displayed on each side.,A credit card security deposit of USD 100 per night is required upon check-in for charges or damages during the stay and will be refunded upon departure.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
